title: Pokemon Live Action Netflix Show in Development! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.26.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about more updates on Activision Blizzard, breaking news on a new Pokemon Netflix series, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
HELP THE HOMIE MEGA RAN: https://twitter.com/MegaRan/status/1419404984047734784
The Roper Report   -
00:06:20 - An update on the Activision Blizzard happenings: The Employees Speak Out
00:26:00 - Pokemon Live-Action Series in Early Development at Netflix From ‘Lucifer’s’ Joe Henderson - Joe Otterson @ Variety
00:40:48 - Mortal Kombat 11 sells more than 12m copies - Wesley Yin-Poole @ Eurogamer
00:37:35 -  Ad
00:48:32 - Death Stranding has sold five million copies on PS4 and PC - Christopher Dring @ GamesIndustry.biz
00:54:02 - Some review Round Ups
00:57:45 - PS Plus games for August were revealed early - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:58:45 - Out today
01:03:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Greg and Gary
